channel.title: Item error when click wear or wield
channel.description:
I'm getting this error that is really bugging me
[17/03/12 4:31 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [17/03/12 4:31 PM]: at server.rs2.items.ItemAssistant.wearItem(ItemAssistant .java:1235) [17/03/12 4:31 PM]: at server.engine.packet.WearItem.processPacket(WearItem. java:34) [17/03/12 4:31 PM]: at server.rs2.entity.player.PacketHandler.processPacket( PacketHandler.java:139) [17/03/12 4:31 PM]: at server.rs2.entity.player.Client.processQueuedPackets( Client.java:1078) [17/03/12 4:31 PM]: at server.rs2.entity.player.PlayerHandler.process(Player Handler.java:137) [17/03/12 4:31 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:141)
It happening to most of the new items I add.
